Its a game that is for every masochist out there. Do you like to be scolded at by a intoxicated russian that in some ways resembles your dad? Do you like getting severe deppression just because you couldnt get a rank that you wanted? Do you want your parents to hate you? Well this game is for you.

In all seriousness this game is actually fantastic at creating friends (and russians screaming at you) and making your fps game stronger (side effects include your brain molding)

Love this game more than any game ever but it is so unfriendly for new people I could never recommend it. Hackers, smurfs, terrible ranking system, 64 tick in 2021. Now if you play in a third party match making it fixes some of these issues but until valve fixes this I cant recommend it and its a shame.
